page.title: 09Local Industry in Our Area
page.content: Although Harden is a small village surrounded by farmland, moors and parks, we have important manufacturing industries here. Ellisons Circlips is known worldwide for its making of metal clips for joining parts and pipes together. A few years ago they won a Queen's award for industry for their work. Jonas Woodhead's make springs for many kinds of things. They use different kinds of machines to produce springs of small size and enormous ones for railway engines. The Castlefield Industrial Estate has a large number of different businesses. Primeur import goods from all over the world to sell to catalogue companies.
